parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Authentication signature calculated using partner_id, api_path, timestamp, access_token, and partner_key as hash algorithm. More detail

error_codes.description: Shop is not a mart shop. Please use Mart Shop ID
release_time_from and/or release_time_to parameter is missing or invalid. Please provide both a valid start date and end date to query where start date cannot be later than the end date
Please enter a valid time range input, where the start date should not be later than the end date
The information you queried is not found

notes: The API documentation includes multiple URL variants for different environments (Console Standard, Chinese Mainland, Brazil). The error codes section is comprehensive and provides detailed information about possible failure scenarios.
